name: 杰西·贝瑞
introduction: Jesse Berry made his feature film debut as the young Ricky Hill in the film The Hill starring Dennis Quaid. He appeared in Season 4 and 5 of Good Trouble as Elliot and as a guest star on the series, Lonestar 911 and I Think You Should Leave. His voice can be heard on Dreamworks Sing 2 ("My name is"-baby chick). Jesse has performed with Barry Manilow at the LA Forum and in "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat".
